label: lem-sasaki-aggregator-value
name: Value continuity of the empirical moments

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-mean-aggregator-value
attributes_added.expression: The empirical mean aggregator $\mu(\mathcal{S}, \mathbf{v})$ is Lipschitz continuous with respect to changes in the value vector: $|\mu(\mathcal{S}, \mathbf{v}_1) - \mu(\mathcal{S}, \mathbf{v}_2)| \le \frac{1}{\sqrt{k}} \|\mathbf{v}_1 - \mathbf{v}_2\|_2$ where $k = |\mathcal{A}(\mathcal{S})| \ge 1$ is the number of alive walkers.

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-second-moment-aggregator-value
attributes_added.expression: The empirical second moment aggregator $m_2(\mathcal{S}, \mathbf{v})$ is Lipschitz continuous with respect to changes in the value vector: $|m_2(\mathcal{S}, \mathbf{v}_1) - m_2(\mathcal{S}, \mathbf{v}_2)| \le \frac{2V_{\max}}{\sqrt{k}} \|\mathbf{v}_1 - \mathbf{v}_2\|_2$ where $k = |\mathcal{A}(\mathcal{S})| \ge 1$ and $|v_i| \le V_{\max}$ for all components.
